replies.msg:
Greater B Carol ï¼š
If anyone wants to sing during a protest, there is no other better choice than singing the US National Anthem. Just similar to raising the American Flag 2 months ago during protests which were captured by American journalists, it immediately draw massive media coverage in US. Some fellow Americans even told the press that HKgers are more patriotic than the typically Americans. Even President Trump is moved by what he saw on the press. So, if there are large crowds singing the US National Anthem every night, it should create massive and dramatic impact on US
